name: APLX 122
title: Linguistic Diversity & Social Justice
description: Explores the relationship between linguistic diversity and social justice: the celebration of multilingualism on the one hand and the negative experiences of people who speak ''minority'' languages in ''dominant'' cultural contexts on the other.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): APLX 80; enrollment restricted to applied linguistics and multiculturalism, language studies, and linguistics majors.
